posts.post_content:
I figure this is a longshot, but I won't find one if I don't ask.  I would like to find one of these in the SGC (PSA is ok as well) 2-2.5ish range with reasonable eye appeal. I know it is a pricey, in demand card, but I don't want one that looks like it has been through a washing machine. [emoji2957]  You can email front and back scans and your asking price to my email address, [url]rchilders1973@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks!

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk
